    #include<bits/stdc++.h>
    using namespace std;
    #define ll long long
    #define vi vector<ll>
    #define pb(n) push_back(n)
    #define fir first
    #define sec second
    #define mp make_pair
    #define sf scanf
    #define pf printf
    #define sz size()
    #define foa(i,n) for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
    #define fod(i,n) for(ll i=n-1;i>=0;i--)
    #define mem(a) memset(a,0,sizeof a)
    #define mem1(a) memset(a,-1,sizeof a)
    #define sorta(a) sort(a.begin(),a.end())
    #define sortr(a) sort(a.rbegin(),a.rend())
    
    ;int z[2002000], arr1[1001000], arr2[1001000];
 
void z_function(string s) {
    int n = s.length();
    memset(z, 0, sizeof(z));
    z[0] = n;
    for (int i = 1, l = 0, r = 0; i < n; i++) {
        if (i <= r)
            z[i] = min (r - i + 1, z[i - l]);
       while (i + z[i] < n && s[z[i]] == s[i + z[i]])
            {z[i]++;}//cout<<"here"<<i<<endl<<z[i]<<endl;}
       // cout<<"z[i]="<<i<<"\n";
       // for (int ii = 0; ii <n; ++ii)
      //  {
     //       cout<<z[ii]<<" ";
      //  }
      //  cout<<"\n";
        if (i + z[i] - 1 > r)
            l = i, r = i + z[i] - 1;
    }
}
 
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    for(int test=1;test<=t;test++){
        string str1, str2;
        cin>>str1>>str2;
        int len = str1.size();

        string str;


        str = str2 + '#' + str1;

        z_function(str);

        for(int i=0; i<len; i++)
            arr1[i] = z[i+len+1];


        str = str1 + '#' + str2;

        z_function(str);

        for(int i=0; i<len; i++)
            arr2[i] = z[i+len+1];
    

        int ans = INT_MIN;

        for(int i=0; i<len; i++)
        {
            int k = arr1[i];

            if(arr2[k] >= i)
            {
                ans = max(ans, i + k);
            }

        }

        for(int i=0; i<len; i++)
        {
            int k = arr2[i];
            if(arr1[k] >= i)
            {
                ans = max(ans, i + k);
            }
        }

        printf("Case %d: %d\n",test,ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
